description.p: Combines the properties in two JSON strings into a single JSON string.

prototypes.prototype: dim result as c = json_combineProperties(C json1, C json2)

description.p: Returns the two JSON strings merged together as a single JSON string.

discussion.p: The *[xb:json_combineProperties()]* function combines two JSON strings, merging properties together into one JSON string.

page.example:
dim json1 as c json1 = <<%str% {"first name":"fred"} %str%
dim json2 as c json2 = <<%str% {"last name": "smith","array%":["a","b"]} %str%
dim json as c json = json_combineProperties(json1,json2)
? json_reformat(json,.t.) = { "first name": "fred", "last name": "smith", "array%": [ "a", "b" ] }
